abstract: Australian Prime Min Tony Abbott announces national counterterrorism strategy that includes revoking citizenship or curbing rights of Australians involved in terrorist activity as well as tightening laws on immigration and hate speech.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said Monday that the government would revoke the citizenship of known terrorists and tighten immigration, visa and hate speech laws.

headline.main: Prime Minister Seeks to Tighten Controls on Australians Suspected of Terrorism
headline.print_headline: Prime Minister Seeks to Tighten Controls on Australians Suspected of Terrorism

snippet: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said Monday that the government would revoke the citizenship of known terrorists and tighten immigration, visa and hate speech laws.
